title: Street Chic Summer White Affair
preview: Soul Night Events debuts Summer 2014 with an exciting Fundraiser/ Soul event called Street Summer Chic White Affair to benefit Food Bank For New York City. An exciting line up of live entertainment for the evening including RnB, a Jazz ensemble and African drums.
seo_title: Street Chic Summer White Affair | WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: Soul Night Events debuts Summer 2014 with an exciting Fundraiser/ Soul event called Street Summer Chic White Affair to benefit Food Bank For New York City. An exciting line up of live entertainment for the evening including RnB, a Jazz ensemble and African drums.
